statement_text: But there have still been 8.1 million birds killed this year to help control the spread of the disease and 5.8 million of those [birds] have come just this month as several large egg farms have been struck.

rationale: The segment uses neutral language ('have still been... killed', 'have come', 'have been struck') without high-potency verbs or potent metaphors.
